stylesForPage: .div-p2 { display: grid; grid-gap: 10px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 5fr; text-decoration: none; color: white; margin: 10px 0; }
.i-p2 { background-color: var(--color-red); padding: 10px; width: 40px; height: 40px; display: flex; place-content: center; border-radius: 50%; line-height: 1.1; font-size: 1.2em; }

.p-p2 { background-color: var(--color-red);  margin: 0; display: flex; place-content: center; line-height: 1.2; border-radius: 10px; color: white; padding: 6px; text-transform: UPPERCASE; font-size: .7em; text-align: center; font-family: sans-serif; }
